markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Protective Subroutine](/Feats.aspx?ID=2470) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 73 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Nanite Surge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2463)

</column>

---

Your nanites can augment your defenses. You can choose to activate Nanite Surge when you attempt a saving throw, instead of when you attempt a skill check. If you do, you gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering saving throw.
name: Protective Subroutine
